channel.title: Getting Sponsored?
channel.description:
Ok how would I get a good sponsor for Halo 3 becuase im really really good at Halo 3 and I think I can get a sponser so anyone know any good sponsers that will sponser for Halo 3?
Thanks. :) Zammyking111
Sites I got: www.mlgpro.com www.gamebattles.com
But those arnt sponsers they are clan match up sites :confused:

item.title: Getting Sponsored?
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

I’ll take you on on a 1v1. I am a Captain. Bitch wana go? (in a joking around voice)

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Sponsored?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Lol sponsered already… XD

Good Luck!

You need to get on more often cause you were’nt on much last night.

(might be because I don’t have school this hole week XD)

Anywho add me for xbox live if you want to play something!

skatetopia2006

Right now i’m having trouble cause i’m connecting though my laptop then my laptops wirless card and it not connect cause of the ip sharing thing.

Trying to fix now and if any one can help please PM me.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Sponsored?
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

I’m not gonna play for the rest of the night tonight i got to a lvl 44 and me and my friend started losing so i think its because we are tired because when you’re up at 5:00 in the morning it’s hard to play good at night.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Sponsored?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“hellzowner, post:10, topic:158303”]Im zammyking111 using my cousins account because my account wont get verification email.

I play more then 26+ hours a week xD i spend alot of time on Halo 3 and im a lvl 43 in double team i should be a lvl 46 right now becuause when i got halo 3 it was the very first day it came out and then i only got to play it for 3 days and then my 360 got the red rings of death so i couldn’t play for a month.

GamerTag: Hot Lead Diet

Ps: I live in the USA not Europe ;)[/quote]

Wanna play a game 1on1 or a doubles,trying to get better,atm I am a 44 in doubles.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Sponsored?
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“zammyking111, post:16, topic:158303”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=215748.msg1883570#msg1883570 date=1195256814]

Maybe you should ask somewhere else than here about halo 3 sponsors.

I find it hilarious that someone comes to runescape cheating forums to ask sponsors for halo 3

I think he’s looking for information on how to get sponsored, rather than whether someone here would sponsor him.
[/quote]
Thank you.
Algas are you stupid or something? Because this is the questions section for a reason.[/quote]I’m pretty sure Algas means because this is basically an RS Cheating site maybe you should go to another site to ask about Halo 3 sponsoring?

Read full topic
